keyword: how many calories in a dum dum lollipop
title: How Many Calories in a Dum Dum Lollipop?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a dum dum lollipop, including carbs, sugars, and other nutrition facts per piece, with quick tweaks and FAQs for candy lovers.
h1: How Many Calories in a Dum Dum Lollipop?
assumptions: Standard size Dum Dum lollipop (~5-6 g), hard candy, average flavor like cherry; wrapper removed before eating.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and manufacturer; small candies like these have minimal differences. Check packaging when available.

quick_answer.text: A single Dum Dum lollipop contains about 25 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a dum dum lollipop?
faqs.a: Approximately 25 calories per standard Dum Dum lollipop.

faqs.q: Are Dum Dum lollipops low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, about 6.2 g carbs per lollipop, all from sugars with no fiber.

faqs.q: Does flavor affect calories in Dum Dums?
faqs.a: Minimal variation; most flavors are around 25 kcal each.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in one Dum Dum lollipop?
faqs.a: Roughly 5.8 g of sugars per lollipop.

faqs.q: Are there fat-free options like Dum Dums?
faqs.a: Yes, standard Dum Dums have 0 g fat and are cholesterol-free.
